name: GuestReview
tag_list: urvey, review, guestbook, guest-review, online-survey, online-review, online-guestbook, online-guest-review, guest-experience, customer-satisfaction, customer-relationship-management, crm
overview:
The cloud based application allows hotels to send out automated custom surveys to guests and easily publishes reviews and a guestbook on their own website.

Hotels can opt-in to integrate their guest reviews into their own websites. The guest book function makes it possible to publish an online guest book. The system is suitable for hotels and other types of short term lodging. Questionaires can be fully customised. Guest information can be imported from Beds24.com booking engine and other booking channels.

The free plan includes an online guestbook. Professional and premium plans offer additional functions such as surveys and reviews.
